amendment.description: Amendment clarifies that the cap placed on the WIC program does not include funds spent by State and local governments on the program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment not, preprinted in the Congressional Record, to clarify language in the bill regarding funding and caps for the WIC program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Goodling amendment (A016) Agreed to by recorded vote: 230 - 193 (Roll no. 542).
